level_1_values.rationale: The frame treats women as mere instruments for men’s pleasure, denying their inherent worth and welfare. Self-Transcendence emphasizes caring for others’ well-being and equal moral consideration, directly opposing the objectification and harm of women.

Sexual entitlement strips women of autonomy over their bodies and choices. Openness to Change values self-direction and freedom, affirming individuals’ rights to determine their own lives and resist coercion.

level_2_values.rationale: Sexual entitlement denies women the right to choose or refuse sexual advances. Self-direction (action) promotes personal agency, independence, and control over one’s own actions, directly countering coercive demands.

The frame prioritizes men’s needs at the expense of women’s emotional and physical safety. Benevolence (caring) stresses compassion, support, and protecting others’ welfare, opposing exploitative attitudes.

Sexual entitlement upholds unequal power and status in intimate relations. Universalism (concern) demands equality and justice for all, countering any ideology that places one group’s desires above another’s rights.

Viewing women solely as sexual objects is a narrow, prejudiced stance. Universalism (tolerance) encourages broadminded acceptance and understanding of others, rejecting rigid stereotypes and objectification.
Entitlement is based on biased, self-serving assumptions rather than reasoned respect. Universalism (objectivity) calls for impartial, rational consideration of everyone’s rights and dignity.

level_3_values.rationale: Women should have the autonomy to make decisions about their own bodies and lives, not be subordinated to others’ demands.
Women must be free to consent or withhold consent to sexual activity without coercion or pressure.
Individuals have the right to set and pursue personal values and life plans, including defining their own sexuality.
Women deserve control over intimate aspects of their lives, free from intrusion or entitlement.
Healthy relationships are built on mutual care and respect, not on self-centered gratification.
Men’s sexual desires should not override women’s equal status and rights as autonomous persons.
Fairness requires that all parties’ needs and boundaries be honored equally, preventing exploitation.
Challenging stereotypes about women and sexuality demands openness to diverse experiences and identities.

level_3_values.rationale: Respecting women’s autonomy involves mature acceptance of their decisions, even when they conflict with personal desires.
Evaluating sexual relationships fairly requires unbiased judgment that values consent and dignity over self-interest.

level_1_values.rationale: The misogynistic frame denies women autonomy over their own bodies and choices; valuing Openness to Change emphasizes self-direction and adaptability, directly challenging forced compliance and static gender hierarchies.
